entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
